segments.text: Dad , I want to learn how to drive this summer vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . You'd better hurry up before they've filled all classes . Many people are learning how to drive now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will get registered now at once . Do you know any training schools ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure . You can search for them on the Internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . look , I've typed driver schools , and there are so many results coming out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . teetee Training School , summer program , 3,000 Yuan , learn how to drive within one month , and get driver's license within three months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 3,000 Yuan is a little bit steep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . Let's see the next one , 3,500 Yuan , summer program . Forget it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've heard that the Ideal Life School is famous . They offer many programs and there are many classes available . The charge is also fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Search on the Internet then , see if we can find something more about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , got it . Ideal Life School , programs
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . Let's check out some other schools .
segments.speaker: S2
